name: Under Desolation
description:
Under Desolation is a traditional Roguelike inspired by classics such as Rogue and NetHack, it can be hardcore sometimes because of that. So get ready to go deep, fight horrible creatures and die repeatedly, The lifeforms are a bigger threat than you might think.

Make sure to read the manual and story files as they contain all the details you will need to know.

Source Code: https://github.com/Fenekito/Roguelike-Engine
